monster.name: Forged Beast
languages: Any language it knew in life

trait.name: Forgeheart
entries: Forged are cannot move or take actions while they have no charge counters. At the beginning of each turn, Forged gain one charge counter.

trait.name: Haywire
entries: Whenever a Forged takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage, or 15 or more radiant damage from a single source, it takes an 1 additional lightning damage for each charge counter it has, then loses 1 charge counter.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Wire
entries: You create a 30 foot long line of fire on a solid surface within range. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}), or half as much on a successful save. The line deals the same damage to an creature crossing the wire or ending its turn on the wire.

action.name: Flame Whip
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and the target is pulled 10 feet closer to the beast.

reaction.name: Magic Cycling
entries: When the sentry is targeted with a spell, it may gain one charge counter that lasts for a minute.

monster.name: Forged Breaker
languages: Any language it knew in life

trait.name: Forgeheart
entries: Forged are cannot move or take actions while they have no charge counters. At the beginning of each turn, Forged gain one charge counter.

trait.name: Haywire
entries: Whenever a Forged takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage, or 15 or more radiant damage from a single source, it takes an 1 additional lightning damage for each charge counter it has, then loses 1 charge counter.

action.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage for each charge counter the Forged has.

action.name: Submission Burst (Costs 2 charge counters)
entries: Each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saveing throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and be dazed, or take half as much damage on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Magnetize
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) fire damage and the target becomes sheathed in booming energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves 5 feet or more before then, the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage, and the spell ends. This attack has advantage on creatures wearing metal armor or using a nonmagical metal weapon.

reaction.name: Magic Cycling
entries: When the sentry is targeted with a spell, it may gain one charge counter that lasts for a minute.

bonus.name: Overcharge (Costs 5 charge counters)
entries: The Forged can take an additional action.

reaction.name: Magic Cycling
entries: When the sentry is targeted with a spell, it may gain one charge counter that lasts for a minute.

action.name: Forged Link
entries: Up to 5 forged within range are linked together. While within 100 feet of the mage, those Forged gain a +1 bonus to saving throws and damage they take is divided by the number of linked creatures. Each time a linked creatures takes damage, other creatures linked to it take the same amount of damage.

reaction.name: Magic Cycling

monster.name: Forged Sharpshooter
languages: Any language it knew in life

trait.name: Forgeheart
entries: Forged are cannot move or take actions while they have no charge counters. At the beginning of each turn, Forged gain one charge counter.

trait.name: Haywire
entries: Whenever a Forged takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage, or 15 or more radiant damage from a single source, it takes an 1 additional lightning damage for each charge counter it has, then loses 1 charge counter.

action.name: Aim (Costs 1 charge counter)
entries: The Forged's speed drops to 0 until the start of its next turn and it marks a target within 300 feet. If the marked creature is targetable at the beginning of the sharpshooter's next turn they can use their action to make an 'Aimed Searing Lance' action targeting that creature. The attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Aimed Searing Lance
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/300 ft., one target. {@h}37 ({@damage 3d8 + 6d6 + 3}) fire damage. This attack can target on additional target directly behind the first target for each charge counter on the Forged.

action.name: Searing Lance
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Cutting Sweep (Costs 3 charge counters)
entries: The Forged sweeps its cutting beams in a 60 foot cone, forcing each creature in the area to succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage, or take half as much damage on a success.
A creature that fails this save by 5 or more has one nonmagical item it is wielding bisected, destroying it.

reaction.name: Magic Cycling
entries: When the sentry is targeted with a spell, it may gain one charge counter that lasts for a minute.

reaction.name: Close Enough
entries: If the sharpshooter missed with a ranged weapon attack that had advantage, that attack deals 1/4 damage to the intended target.
